summary: This document is an email chain from August 13, 2019, between FBI personnel discussing a request from the Deputy Director (DD) for a summary on Jeffrey Epstein's girlfriend. The emails coordinate gathering information about her background, her use of Epstein's addresses, and the planning of a future interview with her.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central subject of the investigation; his death is mentioned, and his addresses were reportedly used by his girlfriend.

persons.name: Supervisory Special Agent
persons.role: FBI Supervisory Special Agent, NYPD Task Force
persons.context: An FBI agent involved in the investigation, providing information about Epstein's girlfriend and coordinating an interview.

persons.name: Special Agent in Charge
persons.role: FBI Special Agent in Charge, Criminal Division, New York Office
persons.context: An FBI official requesting information on Epstein's girlfriend to address questions from the Deputy Director.

persons.name: Assistant Director in Charge
persons.role: FBI Assistant Director in Charge, New York Field Office
persons.context: A senior FBI official relaying the Deputy Director's request for a summary on Epstein's girlfriend.

connections.description: Epstein's girlfriend, who reportedly used his addresses when registering for things.

events.title: FBI Email Coordination on Epstein's Girlfriend
events.description: FBI personnel exchange emails to compile information on Jeffrey Epstein's girlfriend, including her background and use of his addresses, and to plan a future interview.

events.title: Epstein's Death
events.description: Mentioned as a past event; the girlfriend was not known to a person or entity referred to as 'C19' prior to Epstein's death.

events.title: Tentative Interview Scheduled
events.description: A tentative interview with Epstein's girlfriend was scheduled for Friday, August 16, 2019.

keyFacts: The FBI Deputy Director requested a short summary on Jeffrey Epstein's girlfriend, including her origins, known information, and a timeline for a future interview.
Epstein's girlfriend reportedly used his addresses when registering for various things.
The girlfriend was not known to an entity or individual referred to as 'C19' prior to Epstein's death.
An FBI Supervisory Special Agent had spoken with an unnamed individual who could provide background on the extent the girlfriend was known to another entity or individual, 'C20'.
An interview with the girlfriend was tentatively scheduled for Friday, August 16, 2019.
